title: Campaigns not prohibited from using negative ads

content.prompt: Which of the following is NOT a way in which the federal government regulates campaigns?

choices.label: By requirements for disclosure of campaign donations
By establishment of federal agencies to regulate campaign finance activities
By limits on the distribution of soft money
By limits on individual donations to campaigns

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
